abstract.t: This document describes in detail the WCOR ("WelcomedCorrespondence", or WC/WCor for short) extension to IMAP."Welcomed Correspondence" is explained in detail in Internet-Draftdraft-szego-wcor-overview-00.txt [WCor-Overview]. This extension isbased on the standard IMAP "Client Commands - Experimental / Expansion"described in RFC 3501 [RFC3501] section 6.5. Welcomed Correspondencecapabilities are identified by the WCOR keyword in the IMAP capabilitieslist presented by a WC-Compliant IMAP server implementation.
